verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: You have heard of little Moses in the bulrush

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: You have heard of fearless David and his sling

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: You have the story told of dreaming Joseph

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: And of Jonah and the whale you often sing

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: There are many many others thro' the Bible

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: I should like to meet them all, I do declare!

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines: By and by the Lord will surely let us meet them

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines: At the meeting in the air

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: There is going to be a meeting in the air

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: In the sweet, sweet by and by

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: I am going to meet you meet you there

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: In that home beyond the sky

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: Such singing you will hear, never heard by mortal ear

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: 'Twill be glorious, I do declare!

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: And God's own son will be the leading one

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: At the meeting on the air

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: There the doubters will be missing altogether

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: All the skeptics will be absent on that da

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: There will be no grumblers present to disturb us

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: At the Achans will be busy far away

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: There the saints will have His seal upon their foreheads

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: Dressed in rainment none but ransomed ones can wear

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: All who have the wedding garments will be present
